text: khwam tacha di thuk fad lng bn phwk khea n thi dı ktam thi phwk khea thuk phb nxkcak dwy say cheuxk ca kxallxhˌ læa say cheuxk cak mnusʹy læa phwk khea ca na khwam kriw korth ca kxallxhˌ klab pi læa khwam khadsn k ca thuk fad lng bn phwk khea nan k pheraawa phwk khea khey ptiseth brrda xongkar khx ngxallxhˌ læa kha br rda na bi doy prascak khwam pen thrrm nan k neuxngcak kar thi phwk khea duxdung læa khey thakar lameid
